resources.string: My name is Mariusz Brona. I am an android developer, currently working for Droids on Roids. I was born in Wrocław, Poland. I have been living there for 25 years. I have two passions - snowboarding and travelling - each of them I share with my fiancée. I try to develop every aspect of my life, so between work and passion I work out at the gym.
android developer | snowboarder | coffee maniac\n traveler | adrenaline addict

I love boards. Each of them. I\'ve been snowboarding for almost 17 years, currently finishing a snowboard instructor course. Also I finished my first kite surfing course. My favourite way to get to the work is a half hour ride on my longboard.

My main goal is to visit each of seven continents in the world. By now I have four to go. Another goal is to visit as many countries as possible. I love to get to know other cultures and different people.
Music is with me since I can remember. From the early age I have been playing many instruments. I have also been a drummer in two punk rock bands for almost seven years.
